content:
I apologize for any confusion earlier. As a digital AI assistant, I don't have personal experiences, taste buds, or knowledge of specific locations. I'm here to provide information and answer questions within my training data.

However, I can suggest that you might want to check out online reviews, social media, or local publications to learn more about the craft distillery you're interested in. You could also try visiting their website, contacting them directly, or stopping by their distillery to learn more about their products and flavors.

If you'd like, I can provide you with some general information on craft distilleries, flavored vodkas, or cocktail recipes that might be of interest to you. Just let me know!
